p: We tested the essential oil obtained from the sample collected on 09/2017 in the Civitaretenga area because it consists of an unpublished chemotype characterized by limonen-10-yl-acetate ( p-mentha-1,8-dien-10-yl acetate). EFSA, in the report “Scientific Opinion on Flavouring Group Evaluation 208Revision 2 (FGE.208Rev2): Consideration of genotoxicity data on alicyclic aldehydes with α,β-unsaturation in ring/side-chain and precursors from chemical 2.2 of FGE.19” [ 38], concluded that p-mentha-1,8-dien-7-al is genotoxic in vivo and, therefore there is a safety concern for its use as flavouring substance.
